NOT in the per-scrobble hot path.","kind":"dev","methods":{"constructor":{"params":{"operator_":"Initial operator address (for global track ops)"}}},"title":"ScrobbleV4 \u2014 Track Registry + Scrobble Events (Tempo)","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"registerAndScrobbleBatch(address,uint8[],bytes32[],string[],string[],string[],uint32[],bytes32[],uint64[])":{"notice":"Register (optional) + scrobble in one tx.         msg.sender must equal `user`."},"registerTracksBatch(uint8[],bytes32[],string[],string[],string[],uint32[])":{"notice":"Register tracks (admin/maintenance). NOT in per-scrobble hot path.         Normal user flow goes through registerAndScrobbleBatch() instead."},"scrobbleBatch(address,bytes32[],uint64[])":{"notice":"Scrobble existing tracks. msg.sender must equal `user`."},"setTrackCover(bytes32,string)":{"notice":"Set cover art CID for a track. Idempotent: skips if already set."},"updateTrack(bytes32,string,string,string)":{"notice":"Update display metadata for an existing track (typo/casing fixes)."}},"notice":"Tracks are registered once (title/artist/album stored on-chain).         Scrobbles are cheap event-only references to a trackId.         trackId = keccak256(abi.encode(uint8(kind), payload))           kind 1 (MBID):  payload = bytes32(bytes16(mbid))  \u2014 low 16 bytes must be zero           kind 2 (ipId):  payload = bytes32(uint256(uint160(ipId))) \u2014 high 12 bytes must be zero           kind 3 (meta):  payload = keccak256(abi.encode(titleNorm, artistNorm, albumNorm))","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"src/ScrobbleV4.sol":"ScrobbleV4"},"evmVersion":"cancun","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":1},"remappings":[":@openzeppelin/contracts/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/",":erc4626-tests/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/lib/erc4626-tests/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":halmos-cheatcodes/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/lib/halmos-cheatcodes/src/",":openzeppelin-contracts/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/"],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"src/ScrobbleV4.sol":{"keccak256":"0xae088068c9a383e106ffe57a24091cd976098dfa6bd0452f6f51b8aa13725289","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://18ef79b8b027f379b6d466c2241d995b56adaffa963bf1b13434a777ee4892f8","dweb:/ipfs/QmWiBd19VAvLWjS3rMkE9ZqYwkeW412dHDwNmFZsHYM8po"]}},"version":1}

params.operator_: Initial operator address (for global track ops)

registerAndScrobbleBatch(address,uint8[].notice: Register (optional) + scrobble in one tx.         msg.sender must equal `user`.

registerTracksBatch(uint8[],bytes32[],st.notice: Register tracks (admin/maintenance). NOT in per-scrobble hot path.         Normal user flow goes through registerAndScrobbleBatch() instead.

scrobbleBatch(address,bytes32[],uint64[].notice: Scrobble existing tracks. msg.sender must equal `user`.

setTrackCover(bytes32,string).notice: Set cover art CID for a track. Only sets if currently empty.

setTrackCoverBatch(bytes32[],string[]).notice: Batch set cover art CIDs. Idempotent: skips if already set.

updateTrack(bytes32,string,string,string.notice: Update display metadata for an existing track (typo/casing fixes).
